content:
the Michigan Daily

One hundred and thirtythree years of editorial freedom

DETROIT AP  Angels Night volunteers found themselves with little to do last night as they combed the streets of the city and answered phones at control centers PERIOD

Krystal Fields a spokeswoman for the Angels Night Command Center said at  p.m PERIOD that there was little to report PERIOD Were just bored to tears here and thats the way we like it she said PERIOD

Mayor Dennis Archers office said official figures on the number of fires yesterday tomorrow and tomorrow would not be released until later in the week PERIOD But arson and overall crime both seemed to be less evident yesterday than on an average night in Detroit Fields said PERIOD

The annual antiarson campaign in Detroit began in  after hundreds of fires were set on Devils Night in preceding years PERIOD Oct PERIOD  was renamed Angels Night and police and fire departments and an army of volunteers set out to reduce arson PERIOD
